text: chaur puok anak ttuoltean pi chamnei la nouv avei del yeung ban bratan aoy puok anak haey puok anak kom bampean( khcheahkhchay knong kar ttuoltean) nung vea del cheaheto noam aoy kar khoengosambea robsa yeung thleak towleu puok anak . anaknea haey del kar khoengosambea robsa yeung thleak towleu ke anak noh pitchea vineasa a nd reay
